# castai_cache_rule (Resource)

Manage CAST AI DBO Cache Rule (TTL Configuration). Cache rules define caching behavior and TTL settings for specific queries or tables within a cache configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Auto mode cache rule for a specific table
resource "castai_cache_rule" "users_auto" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Auto"
  table                  = "users"
}

# Example: Manual mode cache rule with specific TTL
resource "castai_cache_rule" "sessions_manual" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Manual"
  manual_ttl             = 3600  # 1 hour in seconds
  table                  = "sessions"
}

# Example: DontCache mode to exclude specific tables
resource "castai_cache_rule" "audit_nocache" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "DontCache"
  table                  = "audit_logs"
}

# Example: Rule with query template pattern
resource "castai_cache_rule" "query_pattern" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Manual"
  manual_ttl             = 7200  # 2 hours in seconds
  template               = "SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = ?"
}

# Example: Rule with template hash (for matching specific query patterns)
resource "castai_cache_rule" "hashed_query" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Auto"
  template_hash          = "abc123def456"
}

# Example: Short TTL for frequently changing data
resource "castai_cache_rule" "inventory_short_ttl" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Manual"
  manual_ttl             = 300  # 5 minutes in seconds
  table                  = "inventory"
}

# Example: Long TTL for static reference data
resource "castai_cache_rule" "countries_long_ttl" {
  cache_configuration_id = castai_cache_configuration.database1.id
  mode                   = "Manual"
  manual_ttl             = 86400  # 24 hours in seconds
  table                  = "countries"
}

# Output the cache rule IDs
output "users_auto_rule_id" {
  value       = castai_cache_rule.users_auto.id
  description = "ID of the users auto-cache rule"
}

output "sessions_manual_rule_id" {
  value       = castai_cache_rule.sessions_manual.id
  description = "ID of the sessions manual-cache rule with 1 hour TTL"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cache_configuration_id` (String) ID of the cache configuration this rule belongs to.
- `cache_group_id` (String) ID of the cache group this rule belongs to.
- `mode` (String) TTL mode for queries matching this rule. Valid values: Auto, DontCache, Manual.

### Optional

- `manual_ttl` (Number) TTL in seconds. Required when mode is Manual.
- `table` (String) Database table name to apply this rule to. Either table or template_hash must be specified.
- `template_hash` (String) Hash of the query template. Either table or template_hash must be specified.
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `read` (String)
- `update` (String)
